entry.title: In Change logs One in between CR processing another CR changes appears
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

I noticed an one issue, For the material user is trying to extend more plants and sales org in NWBC using CR process. 

In the change document i noticed in between the One CR changes another CR no is showing with some changes on the same material with different CR. How this is possible Once the Final check approved after completing the changes related to the 1st CR then only the 2nd CR needs to process and the change log should appears in the change document right?

Can any one please explain how it's possible where i need to check the reason for this issue?

Thanks and Regards,

Radhakrishnan/P

entry.content:
Dear SAP, 

 

For activation for our Sap Business practice US country on our SFI systems we need to activate the FINS_PARALLELS_ACCOUNTING .

Can you help us please.

regards

Chafik

entry.title: Mass creation of RFQ in S/4 hana system
entry.content:
Hello,

 

We are recently migrated from ECC to S/4 HANA. In S/4, Manage RFQs Fiori app is using instead of ME41 in ECC. We need to create large number of RFQs in the new system.

Hence, we are requesting you to suggest for the option of creating RFQs in Mass (Multiple RFQ with Multiple Suppliers) by using Fiori app.

 

Thanks & regards

entry.title: how to make inco. location 1 in sales mandatory field into optional
entry.content: While creating a sales order, the Inco. Location 1 field is currently mandatory. How can I make the Inco. Location 1 field optional instead of mandatory?

entry.title: Inbound of APERAK D97A Message Mapping
entry.content:
Hi All,

we recently recerived a request from a customer to activate APERAK D97A message in EDI flow. The request is to be able to receive the message after our INVOIC dispatch. This message should contain a response about the correctness of our Outbound message.

I've tried to search in the community if there's some topic about this issue, may I ask you if someone experienced the same implementation?

If yes, what message/idoc type/process code should we use to import the APERAK?

 

Many thanks for your help

entry.title: ACC_DOCUMENT04 IDoc Error: Posting to Statistical IO with a Profitability Segment (PSG)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm encountering an issue while posting a G/L document using they goal is to post line items to a Profitability Segment (PSG) as the real cost object and also to a statistical Internal Order for reporting purposes.

The Internal Order is correctly configured with the "Statistical" indicator active. While the posting works perfectly when I use a Cost Center as the real object, it fails when I use a Profitability Segment. With a PSG, the system seems to incorrectly treat the statistical IO as a real object, leading to an error.

I have already tried using the field E1BPACFL09-STAT_CON = 'X' to explicitly flag the line item as statistical. However, when this is set along with the PSG data, the entire G/L line item is simply dropped from the final accounting document.

The business requirement is to use statistical orders to track project costs, while the true posting must go to CO-PA. My background is in FI, so I am still developing my CO expertise. I would be grateful for any insights on the following:

  1. Is it a standard SAP limitation that a Profitability Segment and a statistical Internal Order cannot be used together on a single line item in the ACC_DOCUMENT04 IDoc?

  2. Am I missing a specific field or configuration in the IDoc that is required for this scenario?

  3. If this approach is not possible, could you suggest an alternative for achieving a real posting to CO-PA with a simultaneous statistical posting to an Internal Order via an interface?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Is debit is '+' and credit is '-' is same in SAP SD & SAP MM ECC & S/4 HANA?
Can SAP S4 display thumbnails in the corner of MD04 and other key sales and purchasing screens?
entry.content: It would really help users understand what the materials are and lower the risk of incorrect ordering and purchasing if there was a thumbnail of the material in the thumbnails in the corner of MD04 and other key sales and purchasing screens.

entry.title: Best practices for embedding analytics and reporting
entry.content:
Hello Team,

Could you please suggest best practices for embedded analytics and reporting where I have to create custom CDS, custom analytical queries and multi-dimensional reports along with KPI creations.

Best Regards,
Malika Bathla.

entry.title: Drilldown and Navigate to in multi dimensional report of custom analytical queries
entry.content:
Hello Team,

On S/4 Hana private cloud, I have a requirement to create custom analytical queries as end user and be able to add new navigations on my queries and remove few standard navigations coming via standard semantics of added fields.

Is it possible to do so? Can we change the order of navigations shown in custom analytical queries - standard navigations displayed?
Can we remove the one not needed and can we add new for new custom field (if added)?

Also, is it possible to get link on line item shown in the table view of multi dimesional report?

Best Regards,
Malika Bathla.

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud CBO logic: Read BP Attachment, Base64, and store as 500-char chunks?
entry.content:
System: SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition and Private Edition
Extensibility: Key-User Custom Business Object (CBO) 

Preparation step: A PDF is attached to the Business Partner with filename

Desired behavior (in CBO logic)

  1. Read the BP attachment

  2. Encode binary to Base64.

  3. Split into 500-character parts.

  4. Save those parts into CBO(multiple rows/items).

Questions for the community

  1. Is there a released (whitelisted) API that CBO key-user logic can call to read a Business Partner attachment by filename or attachment ID?

  2. Are HTTP/OData calls allowed from CBO logic for this purpose?
  3. If direct read from CBO logic is not supported, what is the recommended pattern?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: How can I test external integration with SAP if I don’t have access to a company SAP system?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’d like to test an integration between an external system and SAP using REST APIs.

Is it possible to build or test REST APIs in the free trial of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition?

Currently, I don’t have access to any internal SAP system at my company.

If the S/4HANA Cloud trial doesn’t allow such integration, would it be feasible to use an ABAP Developer Edition or SAP IDES (on-premise) system for this kind of external API testing?

Thanks in advance for your guidance! 🙏

entry.title: CDS Calculate previous month from input parameter
entry.content:
I need to create CDS to calculate pervious Month / Year based on the input.

Example:

define view ZTST_PM with parameters

p_FiscalPeriod : poper,

p_Fiscalyear : gjahr

 

Expected results: Input 008 / 2025- Expected output 007 ; Previous year = 2025

period 001 / 2025- Expected output 012 ; Previous year = 2024

 

Thanks in advance for your suggestions.

entry.title: Batch-specific UoM Proportion/product unit of measure GON invalid for item 000010 Message No. VL382
entry.content:
I've a scenario where I have a finished product managed by a Batch-specific UoM with type: Product Unit, and I am facing this error message when I try to make a delivery with the Alternative UoM (Product Unit) Reference to a Sales order with the Base UoM
"The sales Unit (Also the Base UoM) in the sales order is "KG" and the Alternative/required UoM in the Outbound delivery is "GON" 

"GON" UoM is a custom UoM created equivalent to the UoM: "BAG"

Note: this scenario has been tested in MM by creating a PO with UoM: "KG" and MIGO GR by UoM: "GON" and it's working properly

The error message:

Proportion/product unit of measure GON invalid for item 000010

Message No. VL382

entry.title: Not reflecting Total Fixed/Variable quantities and values in CPTD & CPTA? In costing
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Can anyone help me in this issue, there is no error but i don't reflecting the fixed/variable quantities and values while executing the CPTD i.e. Actual Template Allocation: for production order. Furthermore, the production order contains the quantities. Can anyone suggest what are main configuration points i must check and while process of creating and confirming the production order and its movement type 101, 321 and 322 is the customize process, it will impact on CPTD AND CPTA?
I have also attached the image of CPTA and need to know that it's the configuration issue or another due to custom process of production order?

entry.title: Guidance: creating 4 separate pricing procedures for OR/RE/CR/DR (learning)
entry.content:
My mentor asked me to build four separate pricing procedures for OR (standard sale), RE (return), CR (credit memo request), DR (debit memo request). Could you please advise:

  1. How to set up these four procedures end-to-end in a simple, standard way?

  2. Which parts should be shared across all, and which should be separate per procedure?

  3. How to set Document Pricing Procedure (DPP) per sales order type and map OVKK so each order uses the correct procedure?

  4. For RE (returns): which conditions do you usually keep vs. drop, and how to handle signs and tax correctly?

  5. For CR/DR: what’s the minimal set of conditions that still posts correctly to FI?

  6. In Copy Control with references, which Pricing Type  do you recommend for RE/CR/DR, and when?

Thanks! This is a learning sandbox, so any concise tips or references are much appreciated.
